chestedcompanions.config.invertShiftToOp: If enabled, normal click will tell the pet to sit, and shift click will open the chest
chestedcompanions.config.publicChest.des: Everyone will be able to access and equip/remove the pet's chest, not just its owner
chestedcompanions.config.catInventoryCap: Sets the amount of inventory slots for the cat's chest
chestedcompanions.config.wolfInventoryCa: Sets the amount of inventory slots for the wolf's chest
